com.reliablerabbit.ejg
Class Art

java.lang.Object
  com.reliablerabbit.ejg.Art

public class Art
extends java.lang.Object

Assists games with loading art, primarily sprite sheets.

Author:
Mohammad El-Abid

getClip

public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getClip(int index)
Get a sprite from this sprite sheet

Parameters:
index - Indexes start from zero and go left to right, top to bottom.
Returns:
a subimage containing only the sprite specified

isLoaded

public boolean isLoaded()
Returns:
Returns true if the image is loaded into RAM. Operations will crash the program if it is not.
